Echoelmusic
Echoelmusic
APPL
$(MARKETING_VERSION)
$(CURRENT_PROJECT_VERSION)
Echoelmusic uses your microphone to capture audio for bio-reactive processing and voice-to-music transformation.
Dark
Echoelmusic uses heart rate and HRV data to create personalized bio-reactive audio experiences that respond to your body.
Echoelmusic may save your meditation and coherence training sessions to HealthKit.
Echoelmusic uses local network for DMX lighting control, Art-Net, and connecting to external audio interfaces.
Echoelmusic uses motion data for gesture-based audio control and spatial audio head tracking.
Echoelmusic connects to Bluetooth MIDI controllers for music creation.
Echoelmusic uses your camera for face tracking to control audio parameters with your facial expressions.
Echoelmusic uses TrueDepth camera for face tracking to map your expressions to audio-visual parameters.
Echoelmusic connects to Bluetooth MIDI controllers and audio devices for professional music creation.
Echoelmusic connects to your smart home devices to synchronize lighting scenes and ambiance with your bio-reactive audio experience.
Echoelmusic uses your location to discover nearby events, connect with other users, and provide location-aware audio experiences.
Echoelmusic uses your location to discover nearby events, connect with other users, and provide location-aware audio experiences even in the background.
